<h3 id="X36975">X(36975) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: REFLECTIONS-OF-(A,B,C)-IN-X(36) TO PEDAL-OF-X(36)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4-(b+c)*a^3-(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(36975) = X(8)-3*X(36004) = 2*X(10)-3*X(13587) = 3*X(36)-2*X(1737) = 5*X(36)-4*X(3911) = 3*X(36)-X(37006) = 3*X(80)-4*X(1737) = 5*X(80)-8*X(3911) = X(80)-4*X(21578) = 3*X(80)-2*X(37006) = 3*X(1319)-2*X(7743) = 4*X(1319)-3*X(16173) = 5*X(1737)-6*X(3911) = X(1737)-3*X(21578) = 3*X(3583)-4*X(7743) = 2*X(3583)-3*X(16173) = 2*X(3911)-5*X(21578) = 12*X(3911)-5*X(37006) = 2*X(4316)+X(7972) = 8*X(7743)-9*X(16173) = 6*X(21578)-X(37006)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(36)</p>
<p>X(36975) lies on these lines:
{1,30}, {4,21842}, {8,36004}, {10,5303}, {11,28186}, {20,5697}, {35,4297}, {36,80}, {65,4325}, {90,10864}, {214,5080}, {355,5445}, {376,12647}, {382,1388}, {484,952}, {516,14151}, {517,4316}, {519,3245}, {529,10609}, {535,4511}, {550,5559}, {758,6224}, {944,3474}, {993,27086}, {1155,28204}, {1317,28174}, {1319,3583}, {1385,3585}, {1387,28190}, {1478,5226}, {1483,11280}, {1532,5691}, {1657,2098}, {1770,5882}, {2077,12749}, {2093,24645}, {2646,5270}, {3057,4324}, {3244,11015}, {3304,18530}, {3336,10950}, {3476,4302}, {3486,4317}, {3576,5444}, {3582,5126}, {3612,9613}, {3632,3928}, {3746,10106}, {3814,4881}, {3870,34690}, {3884,15680}, {4114,5425}, {4293,5902}, {4298,5557}, {4305,10578}, {4311,5563}, {4330,9957}, {4333,7982}, {4857,24928}, {5010,5252}, {5048,28146}, {5119,10860}, {5123,35271}, {5131,9897}, {5134,17439}, {5172,18976}, {5204,5442}, {5258,17647}, {5298,12019}, {5886,18513}, {6906,14795}, {7288,15079}, {7987,10827}, {9655,34471}, {10225,19914}, {10246,12943}, {10593,11279}, {11376,18514}, {12047,24926}, {12114,15446}, {12577,36946}, {12732,32426}, {12735,28178}, {15015,17757}, {15071,37002}, {15803,30286}, {16383,29659}, {18524,35451}, {25405,28168}, {25440,34758}, {28164,30384}, {33961,34600}</p>
<p>
X(36975) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {6224, 20067}, {7972, 15228}<br>
X(36975) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (36, 21578), (80, 36), (484, 15326), (3583, 1319), (5080, 214), (5691, 1532), (6909, 4297), (15228, 4316), (19914, 10225), (37006, 1737)<br>
X(36975) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 7354, 79), (36, 37006, 1737), (355, 7280, 5445), (550, 10944, 11010), (944, 4299, 5903), (1319, 3583, 16173), (1385, 3585, 5443), (1737, 37006, 80), (1770, 5882, 11009), (1836, 3655, 1), (3486, 4317, 18398), (3576, 7951, 5444), (4311, 10572, 5563), (5204, 18395, 5442), (5204, 18525, 18395), (7354, 34773, 1), (10246, 12943, 18393), (10944, 11010, 5559), (12114, 36152, 15446), (16118, 33668, 79)<br>
</p>
